text: Viola Amherd (born 7 June 1962) is a Swiss politician and the President of Switzerland in 2024. She is a Member of the Swiss Federal Council since 2019. She is also a member of the Christian Democratic People's Party. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:Brig District Category:People from Valais Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Current national leaders
title: Viola Amherd
